contact_page.label: Contact
contact_page.title: Get in touch
contact_page.subtitle: Whether you'd like to book a stay or discuss managing your property with us.
contact_page.name: Your name
contact_page.managed_by: Managed by Darya — Response within 24 hours.

management.message_placeholder: Tell us about your property — where it is, what it's like, and what you need.
management.faq_0_q: What kind of properties do you work with?
management.faq_0_a: Homes with character — architectural renovations, well-designed apartments in exceptional locations, heritage properties with a story. We're looking for places guests will remember, not generic rentals. If you're unsure, just reach out.
management.faq_1_a: Our fee is 15–20% of booking revenue, depending on the scope. No setup fees, no hidden costs. We discuss everything before we start.
management.faq_2_q: What if my property needs work first?
management.faq_2_a: That's part of what we do. We'll visit, give you an honest assessment, and propose a plan — from light staging to a full renovation. We manage the process end to end.
management.faq_3_a: Today: Brittany, the Caucasus, and Dubai. We're expanding selectively. If your property is elsewhere and it's exceptional, talk to us.
management.faq_4_q: How quickly can my property go live?
management.faq_4_a: If it's ready: 2–4 weeks (photos, listing, setup). If it needs work: depends on scope, but we move fast and we'll give you a timeline upfront.
